    • isBasic

      public boolean isBasic()
      This method checks if there are no complex elements in the array.
      E.g.
       [ 1 , 3 ,17 ] ->  true  
 [ "xx", 8, null ] -> true
 [ "ww", {} , { "a" : 4} ] -> false
 [ [ 2 , 3] , [4 , 5 ] ] -> false
      Returns:
      true if all the elements are instance of JSonValue
